narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Re-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class "C" license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant at Site 001. Site 003 must also pass inspection before a license can be issued. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you after all sites have passed inspection without any additional action on your part. 
If you have not received your license within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
End Section
